abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Additional
            Financing for the Second Road Sector Development Support
            Program Adaptable Program Lending (APL) Project for Ethiopia
            are to: a) assist the recipient in increasing its road
            transport infrastructure and improving the reliability
            thereof, strengthening the capacity for road construction,
            management and maintenance; and b) creating conditions
            conducive to private sector participation in the road
            transport sector. The additional financing will primarily be
            used to complete the second stage of the  APL by covering
            cost overrun related to surface type design change from
            double bituminous surface treatment (DBST) to asphalt
            concrete (AC) surface responding to the growing traffic and
            expansion of town and urban sections reflecting recent
            economic growth and urbanization on some of the roads,
            increased quantities of work items, as well as construction
            materials price escalation in the recent years.
